name: hmat-oss
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}
{% set variant = "openblas" %}

package:
  name: hmat-oss
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: hmat-oss-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/jeromerobert/hmat-oss/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e52eefa6d34d338104c7058f11f724912d6a3626bce4101b5f798c3ab93f383c
  patches:
    - fix-libm-detection.patch  # https://github.com/jeromerobert/hmat-oss/commit/195ee190b2f74c9c2387afe50574004b98b864af

build:
  number: 200
  skip: true  # [win]
  features:
    - blas_{{ variant }}

requirements:
  build:
    - toolchain
    - cmake
    - blas 1.1 {{ variant }}
    - openblas 0.2.18*

  run:
    - blas 1.1 {{ variant }}
    - openblas 0.2.18*

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/hmat/hmat.h  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libhmat-oss.so  # [linux]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libhmat-oss.dylib  # [osx]

about:
  home: https://github.com/jeromerobert/hmat-oss
  license: GPLv2
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: A hierarchical matrix C/C++ library

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jschueller
